DOC.brief_summary: Despite beneficial effect , ureteral stent may produce low urinary tract symptom ( dysuria , frequency , urgency , urge incontinence suprapubic pain ) affect quality life sexual health 70-80 % . This study conduct evalute role Phosphodiestrase 5 inhibitor ( Sildenafil ) relieve symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Is There Role Phosphodiesterase 5 Inhibitor ( Sildenafil ) Relieving Ureteral Stent Related Symptoms , RCT
DOC.detailed_description: Patient : Patient undergo ureteral stent fixation endoscopic procedure Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patient age 20-50 year . 2 . Sexually active . .Exclusion criterion : 1 . Patients LUTS stent fixation . 2 . Ureteral stent fixation open surgery .
